name: Colordodge
description:
Caution there is many flashing colors and text!

See how long you can last!

The more often you allow the
square to pass you, the faster IT becomes.

The more often you shoot the
square the faster YOU become.

* Use arrow keys to move
* Space to shoot

Developed in Clickteam Fusion 2.5!

SFX composed with BFXR
